selections.name: PORTORO
selections.reason: Consistent performer with a solid 2nd place finish last time out at Southwell (7f). The drop back to 6f should suit given the stiff nature of the track and his ability to stay on. Speed figures (58, 59) are competitive for this Class 6 level.

selections.name: SOUTHBANK (IRE)
selections.reason: Ran a credible 2nd at Lingfield recently. Shows consistent speed figures (55, 52) that put him right in the mix here. Good draw to stalk the pace.

selections.name: UP THE ANTI (IRE)
selections.reason: Course winner in December. Recent form is respectable, and returns to a track he handles well.

selections.name: PINJARRA (IRE)
selections.reason: Has back class and ability to contend if pace setup allows a closer to get involved.

danger_horse.name: SOUTHBANK (IRE)
danger_horse.reason: Recent 2nd indicates he is in form and ready to strike if the top pick falters.

selections.name: ROSERUNNER
selections.reason: In excellent form, winning at Lingfield two starts back and following up with a strong 2nd at Wolverhampton. Beat key rival Wind Summer recently. The one to beat.

selections.name: ANEIRIN'S SWORD (IRE)
selections.reason: Coming off a win at Chelmsford. Improving profile and looks the main threat to the favorite.

selections.name: WIND SUMMER (IRE)
selections.reason: Consistent type who finished 3rd last out and was 2nd to Roserunner previously. Should be in the money.

selections.name: EBN SABT
selections.reason: Lightly raced and improving. 2nd at Wolverhampton last time out suggests he is competitive here.

selections.name: RISING FORCE (IRE)
selections.reason: Won convincingly at Lingfield last out (Speed Fig 86). Prior 3rd at Kempton proves track affinity. The clear form horse.

selections.name: PAVE THE WAY
selections.reason: Won over this track and trip on Jan 14. Although the speed figure (50) was lower than the top pick's recent best, the course win is a significant positive.

selections.name: MBAPPE
selections.reason: Consistent sort who finished 3rd at Kempton last time. Reliable for exotic wagers.

selections.name: EYE OF THE WATER (IRE)
selections.reason: Veteran campaigner who can pop up for a place on his day.

danger_horse.name: PAVE THE WAY
danger_horse.reason: Recent course and distance winner who could improve again.

selections.name: PALLADAS
selections.reason: Godolphin newcomer (Charlie Appleby / C Planas). In a maiden field lacking depth, the top connections usually signify readiness.

selections.name: EMPIRICAL (IRE)
selections.reason: Placed 3rd at Wolverhampton recently. Has race experience which is valuable here against newcomers.

selections.name: STAY SALTY (IRE)
selections.reason: AMO Racing newcomer. Watch betting market for clues.

selections.name: NAVAL TRIBUTE
selections.reason: NH Flat form suggests stamina won't be an issue. Interesting switch to flat mile.

selections.name: SEEING STARS
selections.reason: Three consecutive 2nd place finishes. Knocking heavily on the door and brings the strongest consistent form (Speed Figs 79, 65, 71).

selections.name: GALILEO CHARM
selections.reason: Consistent runner with a 2nd at Lingfield and 4th at Wolverhampton. Speed figures (62, 69) are competitive with the top pick.

selections.name: FLYTA (IRE)
selections.reason: Ran a solid 2nd at Kempton (1m) last out. Cut back to 7f should be fine.

selections.name: SHOW ME GOLD
selections.reason: 2nd at Wolverhampton last out. Improving type.

danger_horse.name: GALILEO CHARM
danger_horse.reason: Very consistent speed figures make her the main danger.

exotic_strategy.strategy: Win Bet #12. Exacta 12 over 4,11,13. Trifecta Key 12 / 4,11,13 / 4,11,13.

selections.name: SAVANNAH GREY (IRE)
selections.reason: Won last out at Chelmsford (7f) with a solid speed figure (75). Lightly raced and open to further improvement.

selections.name: SUMMER HEAT
selections.reason: Consistent form (4th, 2nd). Won at Wolverhampton back in June. Speed figures (64, 74) put her right there.

selections.name: LADY WINGALONG (IRE)
selections.reason: Veteran mare with multiple wins in 2025. 4th last out but capable at this level.

selections.name: BEE MY HONEY (IRE)
selections.reason: Returns from a layoff but showed promise with a 2nd in June.

danger_horse.name: SUMMER HEAT
danger_horse.reason: Consistent speed figures and reliable performance.

selections.name: KING'S CODE
selections.reason: In peak form with a win at Newcastle (Speed Fig 103) last out. Proven class and handles the synthetic surface well. The one to beat.

selections.name: PARADIAS (GER)
selections.reason: Consistent runner, 2nd last out at Wolverhampton (Speed Fig 101). Very closely matched with the top pick on figures.

selections.name: HAKU (IRE)
selections.reason: Distance specialist on the All-Weather. 3rd last out and a winner in November. Will be running on late.

selections.name: BEYLERBEYI
selections.reason: Classy individual, 3rd at Newcastle last out. Won a Heritage Handicap in October.

danger_horse.name: PARADIAS (GER)
danger_horse.reason: Speed figure of 101 last out is nearly identical to the top pick's 103.
